readable.title: 3096163135_584901a5ae
readable.content: A boy wears a foam hat to show support for his team at a game . A child is wearing a red hat shaped like a hand . A child wears three " rock out hands " held together by sunglasses on his head . A man in a statefarm.com hat and sunglasses . A person wearing a red hat shaped like hands sits in a crowd .
